commit.message:
WIP - PostValidators returning response but only entities that were actually found, not the empty elements

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

PostValidators now returns cut down ValidatorWithIndex objects if the requested pubkey was not found.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>
